Text: Calibre can convert various formats, with varying degrees of success.
German-English dictionary is missing its the same as the English-German one.. Great work please will you correct thanks.

Sorry folks, my source's copy of the German-English dictionary is the same at the English-German one. It's mislabeled on their site too. I don't have access to a correct copy of this book.

dmaddock1:
